Description.Text:
Property Location
A stay at TRYP by Wyndham Halle places you in the heart of Halle an der Saale, convenient to Saline Museum and Botanischer Garten. This hotel is within close proximity of Handel House and Beatles Museum.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 122 guestrooms. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Bathrooms have showers and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Enjoy recreation amenities such as a fitness center or take in the view from a rooftop terrace. Additional amenities include complimentary wireless Internet access and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of TRYP by Wyndham Halle. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Breakfast is available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, express check-in, and dry cleaning/laundry services. Planning an event in Halle an der Saale? This hotel has 3293 square feet (306 square meters) of space consisting of conference space and meeting rooms.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of TRYP by Wyndham Halle. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Breakfast is available daily for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.

Enjoy recreation amenities such as a fitness center or take in the view from a rooftop terrace. Additional amenities include complimentary wireless Internet access and tour/ticket assistance.
Make yourself at home in one of the 122 guestrooms. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Bathrooms have showers and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

A stay at TRYP by Wyndham Halle places you in the heart of Halle an der Saale, convenient to Saline Museum and Botanischer Garten. This hotel is within close proximity of Handel House and Beatles Museum.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Saline Museum - 2.3 km / 1.4 mi
Botanischer Garten - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
Handel House - 2.8 km / 1.8 mi
Beatles Museum - 2.9 km / 1.8 mi
Marktkirche - 3 km / 1.8 mi
New Theater - 3 km / 1.9 mi
Handel Monument - 3.1 km / 1.9 mi
Franckesche Foundation - 3.1 km / 1.9 mi
Halle Opera House - 3.2 km / 2 mi
Giebichenstein Castle - 3.3 km / 2 mi
Spielbank Sachsen-Anhalt - 3.6 km / 2.2 mi
Zoo Halle - 4 km / 2.5 mi
Halloren Chocolate Factory - 5.7 km / 3.5 mi
Maya Mare - 6.3 km / 3.9 mi
Merseburger Palace Gardens - 14.2 km / 8.8 mi

The preferred airport for TRYP by Wyndham Halle is Leipzig (LEJ-Leipzig - Halle) - 22 km / 13.7 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Leipzig-Halle Airport (LEJ): Approximate driving time to InterCityHotel Halle Neustadt is 45 minutes and distance is 36 kilometres (22.5 miles).

Trains depart every 30 minutes to Halle. From here take the tram to Zentrum-Neustadt and the train to Tunnelbahnhof-Neustadt for the hotel. Alternatively, taxis run from the airport to the hotel, costing approximately â‚¬40.

Driving directions: From the airport, take the A14 in the direction of Halle, exiting for Halle-Ost or Halle-Peissen. From Halle-Ost, continue in the direction of the train station and Riebeck Platz. Continue of the direction of Halle-Neustadt-B80 Eisleben. After the second intersection, the hotel is on the right. From Halle-Peissen, head for Halle. Continue along Berliner Strasse and then Volkmannstrasse in the direction of the train station. Continue as above.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.
